item.title: CVE-2023-3978|2024-08-02T07:08:50.711Z -- golang.org%2Fx%2Fnet -- golang.org%2Fx%2Fnet%2Fhtml
item.description: Text nodes not in the HTML namespace are incorrectly literally rendered, causing text which should be escaped to not be. This could lead to an XSS attack.
